content.question: A vehicle moves along a straight road. The vehicle's position is given by <math alttext="f of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is measured in seconds since the vehicle starts moving. During the first 10 seconds of the motion, the vehicle's acceleration is proportional to the cube root of the time since the start. Which of the following differential equations describes this relationship, where <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is a positive constant?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of f, with respect to t, equals, k times the cube root of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mroot><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mroot></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of f, with respect to t, equals, k times the cube root of f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mroot><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mroot></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the second derivative of f, with respect to t, equals, k times the cube root of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mroot><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mroot></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the second derivative of f, with respect to t, equals, k times the cube root of f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mroot><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mroot></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the second derivative of f, with respect to t, equals, k times the cube root of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mroot><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mroot></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
